Description: The Slider component is an input control that allows users to select a value from a range by dragging a thumb along a track.

template.description: The HTML template for the slider component.

slider-container.description: The main container that wraps the slider track, thumb, and value display.

slider-wrapper.description: Wrapper for the track and thumb elements.

track.description: The track container that represents the range from min to max.

fill.description: The filled portion of the track representing the current value position.

thumb.description: The draggable handle that represents the current value and can be dragged to change the value.

value-display.description: Displays the current value of the slider next to the track.

value.description: The current value of the slider. Must be between min and max, and will be adjusted to the nearest step if step is defined.

min.description: The minimum value of the slider range.

max.description: The maximum value of the slider range.

step.description: The step interval for value changes. When defined, the value will snap to multiples of this step. If not set, the value can be any number between min and max.

visible.description: Indicates whether the slider is visible. Visibility is assumed by default; absence of the attribute is equivalent to 'yes'.

setValue.description: Sets the slider value to a specific number. The value will be clamped to the min-max range and adjusted to the nearest step if step is defined.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set. Will be clamped between min and max.

show.description: Sets the 'visible' state to 'yes', making the slider visible.

hide.description: Sets the 'visible' state to 'no', hiding the slider.

enable.description: Sets the 'state' to 'enabled', enabling the slider for interaction.

disable.description: Sets the 'state' to 'disabled', disabling the slider from interaction.

onchange.description: Triggered when the slider value changes and the user has finished interacting (e.g., after releasing the mouse button or touch).

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Contains the new value and related information.

value.description: The new value of the slider.

min.description: The minimum value of the slider range.

max.description: The maximum value of the slider range.

step.description: The step interval, or null if not defined.

onshow.description: Triggered when the slider becomes visible (state 'visible' changes to 'yes').

onhide.description: Triggered when the slider is hidden (state 'visible' changes to 'no').

onenable.description: Triggered when the slider is enabled (state 'state' changes to 'enabled').

ondisable.description: Triggered when the slider is disabled (state 'state' changes to 'disabled').

drag.description: Drag the thumb along the track to change the slider value. The value updates continuously while dragging.

triggers.condition: on element.thumb, mouse or touch drag

click.description: Click on the track to set the slider value to the clicked position. The thumb will move to the clicked location.

keyboard.description: Use keyboard arrow keys to adjust the slider value when the slider is focused. Arrow Right/Up increases value by step, Arrow Left/Down decreases value by step.

triggers.condition: on element.slider, when focused, arrow keys

hover.description: Change thumb appearance when hovered over. This is a visual-only gesture implemented via CSS and does not emit runtime events.
